author: jon
msg: move archives to the top
remove the "send email to this list" link. the reason is that i'm
having to moderate->approve a bazillion emails because people seem to
forget that they should subscribe to a list before posting to it. ug.
this is in an effort to cut down on the amount of work i have to do.
if it continues, i will remove the address to post to the list as well.
people will be able to find out how to post to the list after they
subscribe.
-jon
